levels.description:
<@ba.vup>Expands</> Attack Range, ATK and DEF <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>; Besides the current target, all enemies within range are pushed away <@ba.vup>slightly</> every time Lee attacks. Increases the likelihood of being targeted by enemy attacks and gains a <@ba.vup>{prob:0%}</> chance to dodge Physical or Arts attacks coming from outside his Attack Range
<@ba.rem>Unlimited duration</>
